channel.title: Mac OS X Vidalia Bundle with 0.2.2.17-alpha out

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Any idea how Wikipedia identifies all TOR exits and won't let you register if you are using TOR?

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 2
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Think about it... As soon as you connect to Tor, it downloads every single Tor relay from the directory servers... Wikipedia is pretty much doing that. The list is publicly available and they just apply a filter to that list.
